summary:
FurArmor Set( hat, poncho, gloves, boots, muffler, earmuffs, shouldercape, coat )
7 types
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Update 4.1.1[/size][size=4] [/size][/color][size=3]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/33043955][color=#6aa84f]DSavage56[/color][/url][/size][/b]
[size=3]1. Temper Recipes added for armor versions of Boots, Hat, and Gloves
2. Werewolf boots now make the sound of a werewolf walking
3. Mage versions of furs created, rated as clothes, provide no armor protection, and have reduced weights
For sorting purposes these start with the pre-fix MageFur instead of FurSet
4. Prices brought into line with raw material costs.
5. A single fur now can make more gloves and earmuffs.
A. One fur makes two sets of gloves
B. One fur makes four earmuffs. But also costs 2 more leather strips[/size]

[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]FrostFall Aware Update[/size][/color][size=4] [/size][size=3]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/33043955][color=#6aa84f]DSavage56[/color][/url][/size][/b]
[size=3] Now FrostFall aware (Does not require FrostFall or Campfire)
 Armor weights slightly reworked.
 Names modified to be more self explanatory.
 crafting : forge -> tanning rack.
[/size]


[color=#1e84cc][size=4]What is this?[/size][/color]
[size=3] 7 styles of Hat, Poncho, Gloves(2types), Boots, Muffler, Earmuffs, ShoulderCape, Coat


[/size][b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]How ot get?[/size][/color][/b]
 [size=3]crafting by tanning rack.
 using console.(help furset)

[/size][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Recipes[/size][/color]
[size=3] SabreCat Leopard : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 sabrecatpelt
 SabreCat Tiger      : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 sabrecatpelt 
 SabreCat Snow      : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 snowsabrecatpelt
 Wolf                     : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 wolfpelt
 SnowBear              : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 snowbearpelt
 Bear                     : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 bearpelt
 WereWolf              : 1 leather, 2 leatherstrips, 1 werewolfpelt[/size][size=3]
[/size]



[youtube]h32QvTf3Z8s[/youtube]
author: Keung
